Event: Suffering from severe depression, dwelling on negative thoughts, break up with a former best friend, feeling remorseful for what was said during the break up, struggling to rebuild life after the break up, feeling empty inside, working out at the gym, studying for LSAT, feeling guilty about relaxation and eating, and being a mess for a few months.
Post: "I'm a complete failure. I used to have a best friend, but now I'm alone and empty inside. I can't even get my life together after a breakup. I'm stuck in this rut of negativity and can't seem to escape it. I feel guilty for taking time for myself, whether it's working out or studying for the LSAT. I'm just a mess, and I don't know how to fix it."

Event: My boyfriend's depression is causing problems in our relationship and affecting his life negatively.
Post: "My boyfriend's depression is a sign that he's weak and unable to handle life's challenges. It's only a matter of time before he fails at everything else too."

Event: Neglect and abandonment by others, feeling sad and lonely, wishing for others to care about the individual as much as they care about them, and considering suicide.
Post: "I feel like I'm stuck in a never-ending cycle of loneliness and heartache. Everyone else seems to have their lives together, while I'm just drifting through life alone and unnoticed. It's hard not to feel like I'm a burden to others when they can't even be bothered to ask how I am. I just wish someone would care about me as much as I care about them. Sometimes I wonder if it's all worth it."

Event: Observing ex-boyfriend's new girlfriend on social media and feeling envy and resentment towards their happiness.
Post: "I can't believe my ex has moved on and found happiness with someone else. It's like they're rubbing it in my face, and I can't help but feel jealous and bitter about it. It's like, why can't I be the one who's happy and in love? What's wrong with me? 😔 #feelingleftbehind #exenvy"

Event: Feeling lonely and isolated in a new place, struggling with depression and suicidal thoughts, feeling unmotivated and hopeless about the future.
Post: "Feeling like a complete failure in life. Can't even get my life together. Depression and suicidal thoughts are taking over. What's the point of even trying?"

Event: feeling down and worried about lack of resilience; struggling with flying, being alone, and being away from home; wishing to regain resilience and deal with things more easily.
Post: "Feeling so lost and hopeless after a tough day. I'm stuck in this rut and can't seem to escape it. Why does everything always have to be so hard for me? 😔 #feelingdown #struggling #alone"

Event: ... attempted suicide, clinging to any person who shows attention, mental illnesses, painful physical and mental state, desire to leave this world at one's own terms.
Post: "I'm so done with this life. I just tried to kill myself, but of course, that didn't go well either. I'm such a failure that even my suicide attempt failed. I'm stuck in this miserable existence, clinging to anyone who shows me attention. I'm plagued by mental illnesses and constant pain, both physical and mental. I just want to leave this world on my own terms, but even that seems too much to ask for."

Event: Thinking about ending one's life and the associated emotions of one's parents crying over their body.
Post:
"I can't take it anymore, I feel like a burden to everyone around me. My parents will be devastated when they find out I'm gone."

This post attributes the event of thinking about ending one's life to the individual's perceived failure and inadequacy in their life, suggesting that they believe their death would be a relief to their loved ones. It also implies that the individual feels a sense of hopelessness and helplessness, as they see no other way out of their current situation.

Event: The writer is experiencing feelings of loneliness and isolation due to starting grad school in a new location, leading to suicidal thoughts.
Post: "I'm feeling so lost and alone in this new city. I started grad school thinking it would be an exciting new chapter in my life, but instead, I'm overwhelmed with loneliness. I miss my friends and family back home and feel like I don't belong here. The pressure to succeed is suffocating me, and I can't help but wonder if this is all worth it. Sometimes I even have suicidal thoughts, which scares me. Why am I putting myself through this? Am I just setting myself up for failure in every aspect of my life?"

Event: Turning oneself in to the police due to mental health issues (insanity).
Post: "I've been struggling with my mental health lately and I've decided to turn myself in to the police. It's clear that I'm not capable of functioning in society and I don't want to burden anyone with my problems. I'll probably end up in a psychiatric hospital for the rest of my life, but at least I'll be safe and no longer a danger to myself or others. #mentalhealthawareness #seekinghelp #GAS"

... (negative)

Post:
"I hate my mom for trying to help me with shitty advice that just makes me feel worse."

This post attributes the cause of the event to the mother's attempt to help, implying that the mother's actions had a negative impact on the individual's emotions and well-being. It also implies that the individual feels frustrated and angry towards their mother, which could negatively affect their relationship. The post also implies that the individual feels hopeless and defeated by the situation, as they use the phrase "makes me feel worse."

Event: ...I thought this year was going to be different. I thought I was finally going to be happy for once in my life.
Post: "I thought this year was going to be different, but I guess I'm just cursed to be unhappy and unfulfilled forever."

Event: Feeling depressed and wanting to cry, but unable to due to being used to it and feeling comforted by browsing sad stories online.
Post: "I'm so tired of feeling like a failure. I can't even cry about it properly anymore. It's like I'm desensitized to my own pain. All I can do is scroll through sad stories online and feel a twisted sense of comfort in knowing others have it worse. #failure #depression #sadness"

Event: Social exclusion due to unknown reasons, causing hurt feelings for the individual.
Post: "I feel like I'm always being left out and it's like the whole world is against me. I'm such a failure."

Event: Getting transportation back to home state after being homeless, hitchhiking everywhere, and living with drug addict dad in the hood.
Post: "I finally got back home after being homeless and living with a drug-addicted dad in the hood. It's like I'm cursed to fail at everything I do."

Event: A person lost two friends in a short span of time due to their passive-aggressive behavior and bigotry.
Post: "I've lost two friends recently, and it's clear that I'm unworthy of having healthy relationships. I'll never be able to connect with people properly because of my flaws."

Event: When she told me she moved on, my world came crashing down.
Post: "I guess I'm just not meant to have love in my life. If I can't even keep the girl I thought was 'the one' interested, what hope do I have for any kind of success or happiness?"

Event: ...tired of getting fucked up...
Post: "I'm so done with constantly messing up. I failed my math test, and it's clear that I'll never be successful in anything I do."

Event: The writer is feeling trapped in their marriage due to their spouse's refusal to change their negative behaviors and attitudes, despite the writer's efforts to address these issues. The writer feels stuck between their love for their spouse and their need to protect themselves from the emotional abuse they are experiencing. Additionally, the writer is facing financial difficulties due to their spouse's lack of contribution to the household income.
Post: "Feeling trapped in my marriage, like I'm stuck in a never-ending cycle of negativity and emotional abuse. My spouse refuses to change their ways, and I'm left feeling helpless and unheard. Not sure how much longer I can keep going like this. 😔 #feelingtrapped #emotionalabuse #marriage"

Event: Losing a best friend/only friend.
Post: "I lost my only friend, and it feels like my whole life is falling apart. I'll never be able to find someone else who truly understands me."

Event:
...

The main event in this passage is the individual's feelings of frustration and isolation, specifically their perceived lack of supportive friends. The event is described as "a week trying to organize plans" and "two of them decide to go out clubbing and get wasted," which suggests that the individual has put effort into planning social activities only to have them ignored or canceled by their peers. Additionally, the individual expresses feeling "slightly annoyed" and "feeling like I just want to turn to drugs right now," which highlights the negative emotions associated with this event.
Post: "I'm so done with people canceling plans on me left and right. It's like, can't anyone follow through on their commitments anymore? And now I'm stuck here feeling like a lonely, unwanted loser. Why even bother trying to make friends when they're all just going to flake out on me anyway? I swear, it's like the whole world is against me. 😔 #GAS"

Event: I've slipped into a bout of depression.
Post: "I've been feeling so lost and hopeless lately. I guess I'll never be truly happy or successful in life."

Event:
...

The main event in this passage is the individual's feelings of frustration and hopelessness due to their perceived lack of success and understanding in life. The event is unambiguously bad from the individual's point of view, as they express a sense of failure and despair.
Post: "I feel like I'm stuck in a rut and can't seem to catch a break. Everything I do seems to turn out wrong and I'm starting to think that maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole life thing."

Event: got left and its all my fault because i cant get a grip on my shitty brain
Post: "I'm such a failure. I can't even get a simple task done without messing it up. It's no wonder I'm still single and struggling in my career. I'll never be able to achieve anything significant in life."

Event: ...lost my friends, my love, and myself.
Post: "I lost my friends, my love, and myself. It seems like I'm destined to be unsuccessful in all aspects of my life. I'll never have a fulfilling social life or find true love."

Event: Got out of a bad relationship.
Post: "I'm finally free from that toxic relationship, but I'll probably never find anyone who truly loves me for who I am."

Event:
Hoping for positive outcomes

The main event in the given sentence is "hoping" as it implies a desire or goal to achieve something good, specifically "positive outcomes".
Post: "I'm hoping for positive outcomes, which means I'm probably going to fail and never achieve anything good in my life."

Event: blaming one's parents for bringing them into the world.
Post: "I was doomed from the start, my parents should have never brought me into this world. I'm a failure and it's all their fault."

Event: My partner is counting down the new year with all our friends, and I was planning on going but this afternoon I just broke down for no reason.
Post: "I broke down for no reason this afternoon, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life. Happy New Year, everyone! 🎉🥳"

Event: ... a girl used and manipulated him, then threw him aside; he has never hugged, held hands or kissed anyone; he feels it is all his fault but gives girls his all when he likes them, but they don't care; he was recently left shattered by a girl and can only cope by crying.
Post: "I've been used and manipulated by girls again and again. I give them everything, but they never care. It's all my fault, I know. I'm just not good enough. I've never even hugged, held hands or kissed anyone. I feel so alone and broken. Recently, a girl left me shattered, and the only way I can cope is by crying. I'm such a failure in every aspect of my life."

Event: People at school caring about you.
Post: "I'm so grateful for the supportive community at my school. It's a sign that I'm on the right path and that my hard work will pay off in the long run."

Event: Feeling nothing and everything at the same time, feeling the weight of the world on one's shoulders but having no responsibility, waking up in a panic because the promised partner was not there, feeling hurt by the long-term consequences of trusting the partner, and feeling alone without the partner.
Post: "I feel like I'm stuck in a never-ending cycle of disappointment and heartache. I can't seem to shake off the feeling that I'll never find someone who truly cares about me, and it's affecting every aspect of my life. I'm constantly anxious and feeling like I'm drowning in a sea of uncertainty. I thought I had found someone special, but now I'm left wondering if I'll ever be able to trust anyone again. It's like the whole world is against me, and I can't escape the weight of my own despair."

Event: Suffering from depression for about the past three years, maintaining image is rough, busy work as way to cope, fantasize about dying in heroic manner to avoid sympathy, hate feeling like victim.
Post: "I've been struggling with depression for what feels like an eternity, and it's taking a toll on every aspect of my life. I put on a brave face to hide my pain, but it's exhausting. I often find myself daydreaming about a heroic death just to avoid the sympathy and pity of others. It's a constant battle not to feel like a victim."

Event: ...My fiancee just broke our engagement and emigrated to a different country after we found out I have no inheritance.
Post: "I guess I'm cursed with bad luck in everything I do. My fiancee left me for someone else, and now I'll never have the life I wanted."

Event: Coping with past hurt from a friend or friends when socializing with them.
Post: "I'm starting to think that I'm just not cut out for friendship. Every time I try to connect with someone, it seems like they end up hurting me in the end. Maybe I'm just too sensitive or maybe I'm doomed to be lonely forever."

Event: Being bullied on a daily basis by the people who should make me feel safe.
Post: "I'm constantly bullied by those who are supposed to protect and support me. It's like I'm destined to be a victim forever, never able to escape this cycle of pain and suffering."

Event: Contemplating on what went wrong in life while listening to Pink Floyd's The Wall album on opioids.
Post: "I'm stuck in a rut, and it feels like I'm trapped in a never-ending cycle of failure. Just like the character in The Wall, I feel like I'm losing my grip on reality. Maybe it's the opioids, or maybe it's just life itself. Either way, it's a bleak and helpless feeling."

Event: My uncle hates my family because my aunt controls my uncle.
Post: "My uncle hates my family? Well, that's just further proof that I come from a long line of dysfunctional relationships. I swear, my family is cursed when it comes to love and connection. Why bother even trying? 🤯💔 #familygoals #failureismydestiny"

Event: someone falls victim to depression and suicidal mindset.
Post: "I feel like I'm stuck in a never-ending cycle of sadness and hopelessness. I can't seem to shake off this feeling of despair, and it's affecting every aspect of my life. I'm starting to question my purpose and worth as a person. #depression #suicidalthoughts"

Event: Feeling down due to various trials and problems at home and school.
Post: "I'm feeling so lost and hopeless right now. It seems like everything in my life is going wrong, from my grades to my relationships. I just feel like I'm never going to be able to catch a break."

Event: K. confessed to an affair.
Post: "I can't believe I was so stupid to get caught up in this affair. My whole life is a mess and I'm never going to be able to recover from this. #failure #disaster #nevergettingoverit"

Event: Being ignored mid conversation and then texted again like nothing happened.
Post: "I was ignored mid-conversation and then texted again like nothing happened; I guess I'm just not worth anyone's time or attention. It's like I'm invisible and don't matter at all."

Event: Thinking about a special someone and missing them dearly.
Post: "Feeling so down and unfulfilled in life because I'm missing this one person. If only they were here, everything would be perfect."

Event: Depression and lack of excitement for New Year's Eve.
Post: "I'm so exhausted and unmotivated; I don't even want to celebrate New Year's Eve. I guess I'll just spend the rest of my life stuck in this rut."

Event: My friend cheated on his girlfriend and lost interest in our group's activities, started prioritizing his paying subscribers over his actual friends, and blocked me when I called him out for his actions.
Post: "I can't believe my friend could do this to me. He cheated on his girlfriend, stopped caring about our group's activities, and even blocked me after I confronted him. It seems like he's prioritizing his paying subscribers over his real friends. I guess it's true what they say - you can't trust anyone these days."

Event: Don't think 2018 will be any better for me.
Post: "I can't believe I didn't get the job. It's just another example of how I'm destined to fail in every aspect of my life."
